Success Stories

Lives We've Touched

Meet some of the incredible individuals whose lives have been transformed through our programs.

Livelihood Training

Priya Sharma, 22

Dharavi, Mumbai

"From a small village with limited opportunities, Priya joined our vocational training program. Today, she runs her own tailoring business, employing 5 women from her community."

Started own business, employing 5 people
Education Support

Rahul Verma, 19

Nashik, Maharashtra

"Rahul was a school dropout due to financial constraints. Through our education support program, he completed his degree and now works as a software developer."

Completed degree, now a software developer
Leadership & Advocacy

Anita Devi, 25

Raigad, Maharashtra

"A passionate advocate for women's rights, Anita participated in our leadership program. She now leads a women's collective working on sustainable farming."

Leading women's collective of 50+ members
Skill Development

Suresh Kumar, 21

Pune, Maharashtra

"Suresh learned digital marketing through our skill development program. He now runs a successful digital agency and trains other youth in his village."

Running digital agency, training others
